activities: Our Company collects personal information from employees and contractors for HR records and for processing payroll, benefits and expense reports.  We also gather meta data (username, IP address, etc) on behalf of paying customers.  This data is maintained in a SOC-2 Type II compliant data centers.  This information is not shared by the Company with anyone.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organizational, Employees, Customers, Vendors data is covered
privacyprograms: Self-regulatory program with the U.S. Dep of Commerce
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
